mapper.select: SELECT A.CUST_ID, A.CLIENT_DIV, A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, A.CUST_CODE, A.CUST_NAME, A.BIZ_REGNO, A.BIZ_OWNER, A.BIZ_UPTAE, A.BIZ_UPJONG, A.ZIP_CODE, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, A.DM_ZIP_CODE, A.DM_ADDR1, A.DM_ADDR2, A.PHONE, A.FAX, A.HP, A.EMAIL, A.MANAGER_NAME, A.MANAGER_PHONE, A.MANAGER_HP, A.VAT_DIV, A.REMAIN_AMT, A.DEPOSITNO, A.BANK_DIV, A.CUST_GUBUN_DIV, A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV, A.APP_RATE_DIV, A.REDUCTION_DIV, A.MANAGE_NO, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.MANAGE_OFFICE_DIV, C.NAME1 AS MANAGE_OFFICE_DIV_NAME, A.BIRTH_DATE, A.MOON_YN, A.WED_DATE, A.REG_DATE, A.CHK_ADDR, A.RRN_NO, A.MANAGE_YN, A.RRN_NO AS INPUT_RRN_NO, A.MANAGE_NO1, A.MANAGE_NO2, A.MEMBER_ID, A.PRO_SEQ, A.M_LIMIT_AMT, A.REQ_LIMIT_AMT, A.OFFICE_AMT, A.JIRO_NO, A.CONT_DEPT_DIV, P.PRO_NAME, P.RELATION_DIV, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(P.BIRTH_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRO_BIRTH, P.EMAIL AS PRO_EMAIL, P.PHONE AS PRO_PHONE, P.HP AS PRO_HP, P.ZIP_CODE AS PRO_ZIP_CODE, P.ADDR1 AS PRO_ADDR1, P.ADDR2 AS PRO_ADDR2, H.CANCEL_DATE, H.CONT_EDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS CONT_EDATE_DDAY, H.CANCEL_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS CANCEL_DATE_DDAY, A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS CARE_EDATE_DDAY, A.CASH_RECEIPT_NO, V.VDEPOSIT_BANK1||'-'||A.VDEPOSIT_NO1||', '||V.VDEPOSIT_BANK2||'-'||A.VDEPOSIT_NO2||', '||V.VDEPOSIT_BANK3||'-'||A.VDEPOSIT_NO3 AS VIRTUAL_DEPOSIT, A.SEX, A.MAIN_DIS, (CASE WHEN H.CANCEL_DATE IS NULL AND (A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))) >=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS SORT_ORDER, 'L'||NVL(A.MANAGE_NO1,'')||'-'||NVL(A.MANAGE_NO2,'') AS COPY_MANAGE_NO, CASE WHEN A.END_DATE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) >= 0 THEN A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))||'일 남았습니다' ELSE (A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')))*-1||'일 지났습니다' END END AS MANAGE_STATUS, 'Y' AS JUMIN_CHK_YN FROM CODE_CUST A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_COMDIV C ON A.MANAGE_OFFICE_DIV = C.COMDIV_CODE AND C.COMSEC_CODE = '0001' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S.CUST_ID, S.DEPT_ID, S.CONT_SDATE, S.CONT_EDATE, S.CARE_SDATE, S.CARE_EDATE, S.CONT_SEQ, S.CANCEL_DATE FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT S WHERE S.CONT_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T.CONT_SEQ) FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT T WHERE T.CUST_ID = S.CUST_ID ) ) H ON (A.CUST_ID = H.CUST_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_CUSTPROTECTOR P ON (A.CUST_ID = P.CUST_ID AND A.PRO_SEQ = P.PRO_SEQ) CROSS JOIN (SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN COMDIV_CODE='1' THEN COMDIV_NAME ELSE NULL END) AS VDEPOSIT_BANK1, MAX(CASE WHEN COMDIV_CODE='2' THEN COMDIV_NAME ELSE NULL END) AS VDEPOSIT_BANK2, MAX(CASE WHEN COMDIV_CODE='3' THEN COMDIV_NAME ELSE NULL END) AS VDEPOSIT_BANK3 FROM CODE_COMDIV WHERE COMSEC_CODE='0330') V WHERE (A.CUST_ID = #{custId} OR A.CUST_CODE like '%'||#{custCode}||'%' or A.CUST_NAME like '%'||#{custCode}||'%') AND A.CLIENT_DIV = 'O' AND A.CONT_DEPT_DIV = #{contDeptDiv} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CODE_CUSTINDEPT D WHERE A.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID AND D.DEPT_ID like #{deptId} ) AND (#{custCode} <> '%%' OR #{alldate} = 'Y' OR ((H.CANCEL_DATE IS NULL OR H.CANCEL_DATE > #{startDate}) AND (NVL(A.START_DATE,TO_DATE('19000101')) <= #{endDate} AND NVL(A.END_DATE,TO_DATE('29991231')) >= #{startDate}) AND (H.CONT_SDATE <= #{endDate} AND H.CONT_EDATE >= #{startDate})) OR H.CUST_ID IS NULL) ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ASC, A.CUST_NAME
SELECT A.SEQ , A.DEPT_ID , D.DEPT_NAME , A.USE_YN , A.REMARK FROM CODE_CUSTINDEPT A INNER JOIN CODE_DEPT D ON D.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId} ORDER BY D.DEPT_NAME

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN B.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS IN_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN B.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS OUT_CNT FROM CODE_CUST A INNER JOIN CODE_CUSTINDEPT B ON B.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID WHERE A.CLIENT_DIV = 'O' AND A.CUST_NAME = #{custName} AND A.BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate}
AND A.CUST_ID > FN_GET_MIN_ID('CODE_CUST')

SELECT A.CUST_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, A.CUST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.BIRTH_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS BIRTH, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.HP) > 10 THEN '***-****-'||SUBSTR(A.HP,LENGTH(A.HP)-3,4) ELSE '' END, A.ADDR1 FROM CODE_CUST A LEFT JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE A.CLIENT_DIV = 'O' AND A.CUST_NAME = #{custName} AND A.BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate} AND A.CUST_ID > FN_GET_MIN_ID('CODE_CUST')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CODE_CUSTINDEPT ( SEQ, DEPT_ID, CUST_ID, ROW_INPUT_DATE, ROW_INPUT_EMP_NO, ROW_INPUT_IP ) VALUES ( SEQ_CODE_CUSTINDEPT.NEXTVAL, #{deptId}, #{custId}, SYSDATE, #{rowInputEmpNo}, #{rowInputIp} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.CUST_ID, A.CUST_NAME, CASE WHEN A.MANAGE_NO1 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'L'||NVL(A.MANAGE_NO1,'')||'-'||NVL(A.MANAGE_NO2,'') END AS MANAGE_NO, A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV, L.COMDIV_NAME AS CUST_LAEVEL_NAME, A.REDUCTION_DIV, L.COMDIV_NAME AS REDUCTION_DIV_NAME, A.HP, A.PHONE, A.ZIP_CODE, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, A.DM_ZIP_CODE, A.DM_ADDR1, A.DM_ADDR2, (CASE WHEN H.CANCEL_DATE IS NULL AND (A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))) >=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS SORT_ORDER FROM CODE_CUST A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S.CUST_ID, S.CONT_SDATE, S.CONT_EDATE, S.CANCEL_DATE FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT S WHERE S.CONT_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T.CONT_SEQ) FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT T WHERE T.CUST_ID = S.CUST_ID) ) H ON A.CUST_ID = H.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN CODE_COMDIV L ON L.COMSEC_CODE = '0125' AND L.COMDIV_CODE = A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV LEFT JOIN CODE_COMDIV R ON R.COMSEC_CODE = '0110' AND R.COMDIV_CODE = A.REDUCTION_DIV WHERE (A.CUST_ID = #{custId} OR A.CUST_CODE LIKE '%'||#{custCode}||'%' OR A.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#{custCode}||'%') AND A.CLIENT_DIV = 'O' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CODE_CUSTINDEPT D WHERE A.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID AND D.DEPT_ID LIKE #{deptId}) AND (#{custCode} <> '%%' OR #{alldate} = 'Y' OR ( (H.CANCEL_DATE IS NULL OR H.CANCEL_DATE > #{startDate}) AND (NVL(A.START_DATE,TO_DATE('19000101')) <= #{endDate} AND NVL(A.END_DATE,TO_DATE('29991231')) >= #{startDate}) AND ((H.CONT_SDATE <= #{endDate} AND H.CONT_EDATE >= #{startDate}) OR (H.CUST_ID IS NULL)) ) ) ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ASC, A.CUST_NAME

SELECT A.CUST_ID, A.PRO_SEQ, A.PRO_NAME, A.RELATION_DIV, A.BIRTH_DATE, A.EMAIL, A.PHONE, A.HP, A.ZIP_CODE, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, CASE WHEN B.CUST_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SELECTED FROM CODE_CUSTPROTECTOR A LEFT JOIN CODE_CUST B ON (A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND A.PRO_SEQ = B.PRO_SEQ) WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId}
